data.title: Bus shelter advertising
data.meta_description: With 215 advertising bus shelters across the county we can help you run successful and cost-effective outdoor advertising campaigns.
data.text:
Why choose bus shelter advertising

County Durham has a population of over 500,000 people

we attract over 19 million visitors every year

our bus shelters are passed by over 22,500 drivers every day

our 215 advertising bus shelters provide 430 opportunities to target your audience across the county

all our shelters are lit ensuring your campaign reaches your audience 24 hours a day, seven days a week

Why advertise with us

We offer affordable and effective advertising opportunities to businesses that want to raise their brand awareness. We are not for profit and the money we raise through advertising is reinvested into the services we offer.

Where you can advertise

How you can find out more or book

If you would like to book any locations, have any queries on how to use bus shelter advertising or would like to discuss your needs, please Contact Bus shelter advertising.
